attributes.action: order Granada to recommission The Krypton Factor!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They've brought back Bullseye, so why not The Krypton Factor?

Bring back the brilliant obstacle course, the great jogging suits and my own favourite the General Knowledge round, with the 'Bohemian Rhapsody' style lighting!

Bring Gordon Burns back to mainstream TV!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
